title: Impacts, Hits, Slams & Strike Sound Effects
description: 170 professionally designed dark cinematic impacts, hits, strikes and slam sound effects
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo: https://soundcloud.com/soundresponse/disturb-impacts-hits-demo


Disturb - Impacts & Hits sound library features cutting edge cinematic impact sound effects perfect for music production, video games, movies, tv, trailers, teasers, promos and more. Whether you need those massive cinematic bassy hits that you can often hear in blockbuster trailers or you’re looking for a dark, creepy and intense metallic impacts and slams, this sound library has you covered.


With this collection of designed impacts and strikes at your disposal you’ll have a powerful, hard-hitting sound arsenal ready to become a part of your next track, game or cinematic project.


Disturb sound library contains 170 sound effects (Stereo WAV files) separated into three categories: 1. Cinematic Signature Impacts 2. Dark Horror Impacts 3. Metallic Tension Impacts


Disturb Impacts & Hits Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 170

Number of Audio Cues: 170

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 13.42 min
